description: Expansion of e.g.f. log(1+sin(x)*x), even powers only.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(n) = 2*sum(k=1..2*n-1, binomial(2*n,k)*(k-1)!*(sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(2*n-k)*binomial(k,i)*(-1)^(n-i+k-1)))/(2^k)). - Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 28 2011a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * (2*n)! / (n*r^(2*n)), where r = 0.9320200293523439... (see A133867) is the root of the equation r*sinh(r)=1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 20 2014
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs by _Olivier GÃ©rard_, Mar 15 1997
